mapper.select: select comment.*,book.*,book.Id "book_id",comment.Id "comment_Id",comment.content "comment_content",comment.critic "comment_critic",comment.date "comment_date",comment.type "comment_type",comment.belong "comment_belong" from t_book book left join t_comment comment on comment.type='book' and book.Id=comment.belong where book.Id=#{Id};
select * from t_book where name like '%${name}%' or author like '%${name}%' or intro like '%${name}%'
select Id,name from t_book order by Id DESC limit 1
select book.Id,book.name,count(*) as heat from t_book as book, t_comment as comment where date between #{begin} and #{end} and belong = book.Id and type='book' order by heat DESC limit 20;

select tag.*,book.*,book.id "book_id",tag.Id "tag_Id",tag.name "tag_name",tag.type "tag_type",tag.times "tag_times" from t_book book left join t_tag_tag tagtag on tagtag.belong = book.id and tagtag.type = 'book' left join t_tag tag on tag.Id = tagtag.tag where book.id=#{Id};
